question: Which Economist was the Co-founder of Samaj Pragati Sahayog?
explanation: In 1990, Mihir Shah co-founded Samaj Pragati Sahayog, which is today one of the largest grass-roots initiatives for water and livelihood security, working with its partners on a million acres of land across 72 of Indiaâ€™s most backward districts. Mihir Shah has spent nearly three decades living and working in central tribal India, forging a new paradigm of inclusive and sustainable development.
